text: Those who made and endorsed our Constitution knew man's nature, and it is to their ideas, rather than to the temptations of utopia, that we must ask that our judges adhere.
author: Robert Bork

text: Never does nature say one thing and wisdom another.
author: Juvenal

text: Nothing is too wonderful to be true if it be consistent with the laws of nature.
author: Michael Faraday

text: If journalism is good, it is controversial, by its nature.
author: Julian Assange

text: Poetry is emotion put into measure. The emotion must come by nature, but the measure can be acquired by art.
author: Thomas Hardy
